products.title: PIQUÉ POLO
products.description: Often mere details make all the difference. This should be kept in mind when choosing a polo shirt, where details determine success, as A|X knows well.

products.title: PACKABLE PUFFER DOWN JACKET
products.description: Winter and padded jackets go together like A|X and casual style: the ultimate cold weather essential now comes in a super-lightweight model that provides full warmth thanks to the genuine duck feather padding.

products.title: PATTERNED POLO
products.description: You need the right polo shirt to immediately achieve an impeccable look. This Armani Exchange item knows all the tricks, so you can put it on and be on your way.

products.title: POLO WITH LOGO LETTERING
products.description: Is a polo shirt all you need for a perfect look from morning to night? That depends on the polo shirt in question — if it’s an A|X organic-cotton piqué style, then the answer is a resounding yes.

products.title: PRINTED POLO WITH LOGO
products.description: Get ready to fall in love at first sight and never let go. This Armani Exchange cotton piqué polo shirt stands out thanks to an oversized back print.

products.title: SLIM FIT COTTON POLO
products.description: Following fashion without getting carried away is above all a question of personal taste. With A|X, there’s no risk of putting the wrong foot forward: as proof, just take this minimal and essential slim fit polo shirt. Why change a winning formula?

products.title: SOLID COLORED POLO
products.description: The keywords ‘heritage’ and ‘simplicity’ perfectly describe this understated, solid colored polo shirt. This masterpiece strikes the perfect balance between the desire to stand out and the need to do so with unparalleled sophistication.

products.title: POLO WITH LOGO LETTERING
products.description: Man: noun, singular. The vocabulary of casual A|X fashion is spoken by everyone. It’s as easy to understand as this solid colored polo shirt with contrasting logo.

products.title: SLIM FIT T-SHIRT
products.description: If you’re looking for a sure thing, this slim fit t-shirt featuring an oversized, acid-colored logo defies fleeting market trends, allowing even the most demanding fashionistas to sleep soundly..

products.title: SLIM FIT T-SHIRT
products.description: You need the right polo shirt to immediately achieve an impeccable look. This Armani Exchange item knows all the tricks, so you can put it on and be on your way.

products.title: SLIM FIT T-SHIRT
products.description: You need the right polo shirt to immediately achieve an impeccable look. This Armani Exchange item knows all the tricks, so you can put it on and be on your way.

products.title: REGULAR FIT T-SHIRT
products.description: Can a t-shirt become the symbol of relaxation and leisure time? Yes, if it’s made by A|X with a combination of cool, laidback features.

products.title: REGULAR FIT T-SHIRT
products.description: If you’re looking for a sure thing, this regular fit t-shirt defies fleeting market trends – even the most demanding trendsetters fall comfortably back on this. Sometimes, essential is all you need.

products.title: REGULAR FIT ICON LOGO T-SHIRT
products.description: With a cut worthy of a high-quality tailored garment, A|X applies the same knowledge and precision to this pure cotton t-shirt. This style is designed with volumes measured to the millimetre, making it impossible to resist
